comprehensive_overview: HiC-Pro is a bioinformatics pipeline for processing, analyzing, and visualizing high-throughput chromatin conformation capture (Hi-C) data. It allows users to generate significant biological insights by studying chromatin structure, genome organization, and 3D chromatin interactions.
core_features: Mapping reads to the reference genome
Filtering and processing valid interaction pairs
Quality control assessment of Hi-C data
Identifying topological domains and chromatin interactions
